title: Donâ€™t listen to them @Riot
body: I am more then happy with the Aatrox Rework. I’ve been playing League since season 3, and have been maining Aatrox since he was released (not on this account, permabanned lel). The VO is fantastic, people just don’t like change. The abilities and overall kit look incredible. His model is a serious upgrade from his old one. All of the people complaining about the VO, abilities, model, etc. are just salty that change is coming. Don’t give in, there is a huge majority who are not vocal about how happy they are with the work you’ve done. Just release him as is with number tweaks that may need to take place, and people will fall in love with the champion. Thanks for the great job you’ve done with Aatrox
